com.radirius.mercury.utilities

Interface Component

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cleanable, Initializable, Renderable, Updatable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicEntity, GameObject, GameScene, ShapedEntity

    public interface Component
extends Initializable, Updatable, Renderable, Cleanable
    An abstraction for components, objects which are initialized, updated, rendered and cleaned up.
    Author:
    Jeviny
